column2:
"Oracle.
An enormous fleet capable of freely travelling between planets."

"Oracle has one purpose.
To protect the universe that is shrouded in
darkness by the [Profound Darkness]."

"Thus, to counter the [Profound Darkness],
Oracle has created an organization called 「ARKS」. "

"ARKS can manipulate 「Photons」 which are the only way to
eliminate the threat produced by
the [Profound Darkness], called 「Darkers」."

"From planet to planet, investigating if
the influence of Darkers can be found.
Eliminating the threat of them, that is the task of ARKS. "

"That is, until a big event happened.
It was sad and we lost many."

"However, Oracle is……ARKS is still there.
Human, Newman, Cast, Dewman.
Combining the power of the four races to combat the [Profound Darkness]."

"An endless battle…that will never be crushed.
We'll keep fighting for the future's hope."

"Now, two years have passed since
the elimination of the new [Profound Darkness].
The world was trying to bring forth, a new crisis."

"But now it's time for ARKS to reawaken
the hope that makes us shine strong."
